item.title: Past Main
item.description: This is my past Main page. Now that it’s deprecated, I moved it here. Blockchain ¶ Humans have pondered how to work together for millions of years, and so far we have done fairly well – our complex legal and financial systems evolved to reduce externalities and support collaboration. However, they are deprecating rapidly in the face of enormous societal transformations, either hardly iterating or disproportionately benefiting the few. Incentive misalignment has once again become a serious hamper on productivity.
